goal: Create a recurring "Daily Standup" event at 9am on July 18, 2024, that repeats daily, and adjust the July 22, 2024, event to start at 10 AM.

evals.description: Daily Standup event created with correct title
Daily Standup event set to repeat daily (at least 7 days)
evals.query: iterable_item_added.* | [?title==`Daily Standup` && (contains(@.start, '2024-07-18') || contains(@.start, '2024-07-19') || contains(@.start, '2024-07-20') || contains(@.start, '2024-07-21') || contains(@.start, '2024-07-22') || contains(@.start, '2024-07-23') || contains(@.start, '2024-07-24'))] | length(@) >= `7`

evals.description: Daily Standup event starts from July 18, 2024
Daily Standup event scheduled at 9 AM
July 22, 2024 event adjusted to start at 10 AM
